skill.name: executing-plans
skill.description: Disciplined plan execution for implementation tasks. Use when executing a saved implementation plan, following step-by-step instructions from a plan document.
skill.summary: Disciplined plan execution for implementation tasks. Use when executing a saved implementation plan,...
skill.author: CodingCossack

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and process guidelines for executing implementation plans. No executable code, network calls, or file system access detected. It provides a structured methodology for AI assistants to follow when implementing development plans.

content.value_statement: Development plans often fail when executed without structure or verification. This skill provides a disciplined methodology for implementing plans with batch processing and review checkpoints.
actual_capabilities: Loads and critically reviews implementation plans before execution
Executes tasks in batches of 3 with verification steps
Reports progress between batches for human review
Integrates with finishing-a-development-branch skill for completion
Provides structured stop conditions for blockers and clarifications
limitations: Requires a pre-written implementation plan to function
Depends on finishing-a-development-branch skill for final steps
Cannot create plans - only executes existing ones
Requires human feedback between execution batches

use_cases.title: Implement Feature Plans
use_cases.description: Follow step-by-step implementation plans for new features with verification at each step

use_cases.title: Execute Refactoring Plans
use_cases.description: Systematically refactor codebases using pre-planned refactoring strategies

use_cases.title: Process Complex Tasks
use_cases.description: Break down and execute multi-step development tasks with structured checkpoints

prompt_templates.title: Start Implementation
prompt_templates.scenario: You have a plan file ready
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm using the executing-plans skill to implement this plan. Please load and review the plan, then execute the first batch of 3 tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Continue After Feedback
prompt_templates.prompt: Based on the feedback provided, continue with the next batch of tasks from the implementation plan.

prompt_templates.title: Handle Blocker
prompt_templates.prompt: I've hit a blocker - the instruction says [quote instruction] but I'm not sure how to proceed. Can you clarify?

prompt_templates.title: Complete Implementation
prompt_templates.prompt: All tasks from the plan have been completed and verified. I'm using the finishing-a-development-branch skill to complete this work.

best_practices: Always review the plan critically before starting execution to identify potential issues
Stop immediately when encountering unclear instructions rather than making assumptions
Run all verification commands specified in the plan before marking tasks complete
anti_patterns: Executing tasks without the required finishing-a-development-branch skill available
Continuing past batch size limits without reporting progress for review
Skipping verification steps to speed up execution

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with other planning skills?
faq.answer: Yes, it integrates specifically with the writing-plans skill which creates the implementation plans that this skill executes.

faq.question: What happens if I don't have the finishing-a-development-branch skill?
faq.answer: The execution will fail at step 5. You must have both skills installed for complete plan execution.

faq.question: Can I change the batch size from 3 tasks?
faq.answer: The default is 3 tasks per batch, but you can adjust based on task complexity and your review preferences.

faq.question: Is my code safe during execution?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only follows your pre-written plan. It doesn't make autonomous changes or access external resources.

faq.question: What if a verification step fails repeatedly?
faq.answer: Stop execution immediately and report the issue. Don't mark tasks complete until verifications pass.

faq.question: How is this different from regular AI code generation?
faq.answer: This skill follows a structured plan with checkpoints, rather than generating code autonomously without oversight.
